post.title: Captainmeta4 on the recent data migration issue

author.bio:
Goodbye. https://ruqqus.com/+The_Cabal/post/d9y9/i-told-you-so-all-the

Remember: History repeats, and the unaware are doomed to repeat it.
author.bio_html:
Goodbye. https://ruqqus.com/+The_Cabal/post/d9y9/i-told-you-so-all-the

Remember: History repeats, and the unaware are doomed to repeat it.

body:
I'm a bit confused here. I made plenty of comments in the 2 days prior to the move, and even the most recent ones from just hours or even less before the Heroku suspension remained intact for me. I did, however, lose the majority of post votes and rep from up to 10 days before ruqqus came back on. I don't see any lost comments.

Also, I've never hosted a website before, but why would the most recent comments/votes be at odds with the rest of the database simply because you switched hosts?
body_html:
I'm a bit confused here. I made plenty of comments in the 2 days prior to the move, and even the most recent ones from just hours or even less before the Heroku suspension remained intact for me. I did, however, lose the majority of post votes and rep from up to 10 days before ruqqus came back on. I don't see any lost comments.

Also, I've never hosted a website before, but why would the most recent comments/votes be at odds with the rest of the database simply because you switched hosts?
